name: Trap Boulder 3
overview: The followup to Trap Boulder 1 (there was no Trap Boulder 2, unless it somehow got lost) Unlike the first Trap Boulder, which was developed by Leon, someone named Eric also worked on this one along with Leon. A Boulder Dash game developed using Peter Leipa's Boulder Dash Construction Kit. Also, just like Trap Boulder 1, Trap Boulder 3 also has an unknown release date.
